categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Sooloot was a Jedi Master and a scholar of the Jedi Order who most notably remarked on the origins of the Prophecy of the Chosen One.

A Jedi Master, Sooloot studied the Prophecy of the Chosen One before concluding that it was written down sometime around the First Great Schism. As to the mention of the Sith, Sooloot believed that the mention of the Sith on the prophecy was added at a later date for clarification of the intended meaning. Jedi Grand Master Fae Coven would remark on Sooloot's beliefs in the chapter entitled, The Prophecy of the Chosen One within her Temple guidebook, The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force. However, the text about the Chosen One would later be removed by Sith Lord Darth Sidious.
